resources.string: \t\t\tThis is a good option for lunch or dinner. It does not use too much cheese, and avocados contain healthy fats and nutrients
1. Heat olive oil in a pan over medium heat. Crack eggs into pan; cook for 1 to 2 minutes. Flip and cook egg until done, 2 to 5 minutes more. Transfer eggs to a plate and season with salt and pepper.
2. Spread butter onto 1 side of each bread slice.
3. Lay bread slices in the hot pan, butter-side down. Quickly layer cheese, 1 fried egg, avocado, and remaining bread slice, butter-side up.
4. Carefully flip sandwich to grill other side until golden brown, 3 to 4 minutes. remove it from the pan and cut into half.
\t\t\tEggs are a good source of protein. Eggs taste good, are protein-filled and really easy to make.
1. Beat eggs, milk, and a pinch of salt together in a bowl.
2. Heat olive oil in a pan over medium heat; cook Spinach and stir until it is wilted, 3 to 5 minutes.
3. Pour egg mixture into the pan and cook until eggs are still soft and halfway cooked, 2 to 3 minutes.
4. Add grated cheese to egg mixture; cook until eggs are set and cheeses are melted, 3 to 4 more minutes. Season with salt and pepper.
\t\t\t Sprucing up your leafy greens with veggies, beans, chickpeas, nuts or seeds, and then drizzling with olive oil and vinegar. You can add a piece of crispy bread to make it more of a meal.
1.In a large bowl, combine the cauliflower, broccoli, cherry tomatoes, olives and cheese.
2.Add enough dressing to coat, toss and refrigerate overnight.
\t\t\tThis is a good option for lunch or dinner.You can add a fried egg on top of anything and make it more of a hearty meal, like on top of salad
1.Heat 2 teaspoons vegetable oil in a large pan. Cook and stir onion over medium heat until onions begin to brown.
2.Combine tuna, cream cheese, mozzarella cheese, olives, dill, garlic powder, and cooked onion in a large bowl.
3.Beat eggs with milk in a large bowl. Heat 2 teaspoons of oil in the pan used to cook the onions. Pour the egg mixture into the hot pan.
4.When eggs are almost fully set, spoon tuna mixture onto one half of the eggs; fold the un topped half over the filling. Cover pan, and remove from heat.
\t\t\tThe Greek quesadillas are packed with vegetables such as spinach and peppers. It is just a good way to make a satisfying meal that is easy to make.
1.In a medium bowl, stir together Greek yogurt, cucumber, dill, and lemon juice. Season to taste with salt, pepper and red pepper flakes.

2. In a large pan over medium heat, heat olive oil. Add one half tortilla, cut-side up. Top with a handful each of mozzarella and Spinach. Sprinkle with feta, red peppers, olives and dill. Top with the matching tortilla half, cut-side down.
3. Cook until the cheese is melted and the bottom pita is golden, about 2 minutes. Carefully flip and continue to cook until the second side is golden, about 2 minutes more.
4. Repeat with remaining ingredients. Cut quesadillas into wedges
\t\t\tThis sandwich is made with hummus – and it is vegan-friendly. Combine whatever vegetables you have on hand with hummus on a sandwich. It is delicious and satisfying, and it is good for you.
1. Top one slice of whole wheat bread with Cheddar cheese, onion, tomato, bell pepper, avocado, and spinach.
2. Season with salt and pepper, and sprinkle with olive oil and vinegar.
3. Top with dill pickle slices, olives, jalapeno pepper, and the second slice of bread.

It is an application that helps users with various dietary plans. This app will help the users maintain a healthy diet. This will helps users to follow proper diet and keep count on their calorie’s intake. This will help users to lose weight, stay healthy and stronger.

\t\tEating a healthy, balanced diet is one of the most important things you can do to protect your health. It is not about strict limitations, staying unrealistically thin, or depriving yourself of the foods you love. Rather, it’s about feeling great, having more energy, improving your health, and boosting your mood.Healthy lifestyle is gaining popularity day by day in this modern times.
